text: Yoshito “Tom” Yasumi (born August 20, 1965) is a Japanese animation director and director on SpongeBob SquarePants and Rocko's Modern Life. ==Filmography== ===Television=== *ABC Weekend Specials (1989) *The Legend of Prince Valiant (1991) *Rugrats (1992-1994) *Rocko's Modern Life (1995-1996) *The Angry Beavers (1997-1999) *SpongeBob SquarePants (1999-2022) *Oh Yeah! Cartoons (1999) *Catscratch (2005) *Sanjay and Craig (2013) *Clarence (2014) *Animaniacs (2020-2021) *The Great North (2021) *Central Park (2022) ===Movies=== *The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie (2004) *Square Roots: The Story of SpongeBob SquarePants (2009) *SpongeBob's Truth or Square (2009) *The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water (2015) *SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout (2019) ===Shorts=== *The Side View (1985) *SpongeBob SquarePants 4-D (2005) *Harold & Herbert in Dumpster Driving (2019) Category:Japanese movie directors Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Tom Yasumi
